unique.title: What makes Kaissa unique?
unique.point1: An interface designed with and for players: Modern, fluid and enjoyable to use.
unique.point2: A smart approach to game databases: Classify, filter and find your games easily.
unique.point3: Powerful and easy-to-use tools: Simplified annotation, rethought analysis and Stockfish integration.
unique.point4: A rich and living backlog: Kaissa evolves every day thanks to our community of passionate players.

erwan.bio1: Always at tournaments and on the road, I needed a simple, fast tool accessible everywhere, from any device.
erwan.bio2: Not a complicated system, but a clear space to analyze, review and progress, directly online.
erwan.bio3: This application was born from this need and that of many other players.

thibault.bio1: When I discovered chess a few years ago, I wanted to progress seriously, but I realized that the available tools weren't made for that: too complicated, too old, or simply not adapted for beginners.
thibault.bio2: With Erwan, we decided to create Kaissa: an application easy to use and powerful enough to help the most experienced players.
thibault.bio3: My role is to lead the product design so that Kaissa unleashes its full potential, for you.

anthony.bio1: I was contacted by Thibault to bring my expertise in the field of user experience.
anthony.bio2: Kaissa's challenge is significant: solving the ergonomic problems of game analysis applications and offering a modern, fluid, and ultra-powerful solution.
anthony.bio3: Today, I am very proud of what Pionics has developed!

theo.bio1: Kaissa must be a tool that truly accompanies players in their daily practice.
theo.bio2: Simple, fast, accessible everywhere â€” but also capable of evolving with you, at the pace of your needs.
theo.bio3: I ensure that technology remains at the service of what matters: a fluid, useful experience, faithful to your realities.
